title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a Temperature class that:
- Stores temperature in Celsius (private)
- Has celsius property (read/write with validation)
- Has fahrenheit property (computed, read/write)
- Has kelvin property (computed, read-only)
- Validates: Celsius >= -273.15 (absolute zero)
instructions:

hints.text: Use self.__celsius for private storage. Validate >= -273.15 in celsius setter.
